breen.criticalNotes: Default: modern variant. For 'revealed': energy barrier follows face contours (not flat), face is REPTILIAN (not human) with flat nose extending into forehead plate.

uniforms.officer: Blue/white dress uniform with rank insignia

features: Spots running from temples down neck

uniforms.hunter_armored: SILVER-BLUE metallic full body armor with FULL HELMET, narrow visor slit, respirator mask
uniforms.hunter_partial_mask: SILVER-BLUE armor with RESPIRATOR MASK on lower face, upper skull/eyes visible
uniforms.hunter_unmasked: BRONZE/OLIVE hunting armor, face fully visible showing dual-lobed skull
uniforms.alpha: Enhanced SILVER-BLUE armor with elaborate trophy decorations, alpha status markings
uniforms.beta: Standard SILVER-BLUE hunting gear, fewer trophies

cranialStructure: ENLARGED DUAL-LOBED CRANIUM - two distinct BULGING LOBES on top of skull (KEY FEATURE!)
Head is OVERSIZED compared to humans
Completely BALD - no hair on head or face
facialFeatures: FLAT NOSE - almost no nasal bridge, nostrils sit FLUSH with face (like reptile/Saurian)
NO LIPS - mouth is a lipless reptilian slit
HEAVY BROW RIDGES protruding over deep-set predatory eyes
skin: SCALED/PEBBLED TEXTURE like Gila monster skin
TAN/BEIGE to OLIVE coloring with darker MOTTLED patches

full_helmet.description: FULL-FACE HUNTING HELMET covering entire head
full_helmet.helmet: SILVER-BLUE metallic, angular predatory shape, narrow horizontal visor slit with amber glow
full_helmet.respirator: Ribbed metal grille over mouth/nose, tubes connecting to suit
full_helmet.armor: SILVER-BLUE metallic segmented plates, battle-worn finish

partial_mask.description: Upper skull visible, lower face covered by respirator mask
partial_mask.visible: Dual-lobed cranium, brow ridges, eyes, scaled skin on forehead
partial_mask.mask: SILVER-BLUE metallic respirator covering nose and mouth

unmasked.description: Face fully visible, no helmet or mask
unmasked.visible: Full dual-lobed skull, flat nose, lipless mouth, all facial features
unmasked.armor: BRONZE/OLIVE hunting armor matching skin tones

features: DUAL-LOBED SKULL (two bulges on top of head)
FLAT NOSE (flush with face, no bridge)
hirogen.criticalNotes: HEAD SHAPE is iconic: TWO BULGING LOBES on skull. NOSE is FLAT against face. NO LIPS. Skin like Gila monster. Silver-blue armor when suited, bronze/olive when unarmored.

uniforms.formal: Flowing elegant robes in purples, lavenders, and silvers
uniforms.starfleet: Standard Starfleet uniform (if serving in fleet)
uniforms.casual: Sophisticated civilian clothing in soft colors

features: SOLID BLACK EYES - completely black, no visible iris or pupil (KEY FEATURE!)
Humanoid appearance nearly identical to humans except for eyes
betazoid.criticalNotes: BLACK EYES are the key distinguishing feature. Otherwise very human-like. Telepathic/empathic. Often female leaders (matriarchal). Purple/lavender color scheme.

uniforms.fighter: Rugged civilian clothing - leather jackets, practical gear
uniforms.leader: Worn but dignified civilian clothes, leadership bearing
uniforms.undercover: Nondescript civilian clothing for blending in

features: Mixed species appearance (Human, Bajoran, or other Federation species)
Scars or signs of hard living common
maquis.criticalNotes: NO Starfleet uniforms - they rejected Starfleet. Earth tones: browns, greens, blacks. Resistance/guerrilla aesthetic. Passionate freedom fighters.

pirates.speciesNotes: IMPORTANT: Do NOT use Nausicaans or Orions - they have their own factions. Use diverse lesser-known species.

uniforms.commander: Dark military-style uniform with medals, corrupted admiral aesthetic
uniforms.captain: Impressive dark armor or uniform, commanding presence
uniforms.raider: Stolen/scavenged armor pieces, dark colors, tactical gear
uniforms.crew: Basic raider gear, visible weapons, practical clothing

pirates.aesthetic: Dangerous, intimidating, criminal - military discipline gone dark

speciesVariants.human: Scarred, rough humans - often ex-military or criminals
speciesVariants.bolian: Blue-skinned with vertical ridge down center of face
speciesVariants.tellarite: Porcine features, snout-like nose, stocky build
speciesVariants.lurian: Large head, wide-set eyes, no visible ears (like Morn)
speciesVariants.yridian: Wrinkled grayish skin, information brokers turned pirates
speciesVariants.boslic: Humanoid with slight forehead ridges, often female
speciesVariants.alien: Generic alien - unusual skin color or minor prosthetics

features: Mixed diverse species - NOT Nausicaan or Orion
Dark colors: black, dark gray, deep red
pirates.criticalNotes: DO NOT USE Nausicaans (they have own faction) or Orions (they have own faction). Use diverse species: humans, Bolians, Tellarites, Lurians, Yridians, etc. Leader is human in dark military uniform. Dark, militaristic criminal aesthetic.

uniforms.infiltrator: Can mimic humanoid forms when disguised

species8472.criticalNotes: NOT humanoid at all. Tripedal (3 legs), 3 arms, multiple eyes, no mouth. Gray-purple skin. From fluidic space. Terrifying alien appearance.

uniforms.chieftain: Heavy ceremonial armor with trophies, intimidating presence
uniforms.warrior: Rough leather and metal armor, practical combat gear
uniforms.raider: Light tactical gear for quick raids

physicalFeatures.height: VERY TALL - over 2 meters, lean and imposing
physicalFeatures.build: LEAN but muscular - athletic predator build, NOT bulky orc
physicalFeatures.tusks: TWO TUSKS curving UPWARD from LOWER JAW (KEY FEATURE!)
physicalFeatures.eyes: DEEP-SET small eyes under heavy brow ridge
physicalFeatures.skin: GRAY or TAN leathery skin texture (NOT green!)
physicalFeatures.hair: Completely BALD - no hair at all

features: TWO TUSKS curving UP from lower jaw (KEY FEATURE!)
ELONGATED SKULL - high forehead sloping back like Predator
VERY TALL (2m+) and LEAN - athletic not bulky
Deep-set small eyes, prominent angular cheekbones
GRAY/TAN leathery skin (NOT green, NOT orc)
Think: Predator movie alien meets mercenary
nausicaan.criticalNotes: NOT an orc! Predator-like appearance: elongated skull sloping back, prominent cheekbones, deep-set eyes. TWO TUSKS curving upward from lower jaw. GRAY/TAN skin (not green). Very tall and LEAN (not bulky). Bald. Dangerous mercenary aesthetic.
